data.title: Sharma Robin, Signed
data.meta_description: The Saint, the Surfer and the CEO: A Remarkable Story about Living Your Heart's Desires by Robin Sharma and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Condition: Fair. 2003. No Edition Remarks. 221 pages. Signed by the author. Illustrated paper cover. Signed by the author with dedication to Brian on title page. Slight crinkling to paper at gutter. Clean pages with light tanning to text block edges. Binding is firm throughout with minor thumb-marking. Minor dog-eared corners. Paper covers have moderate edge-wear with slight rubbing to surfaces and curling to corners. Visible wear marks to covers.

Condition: Very Good. 2021. First Edition. 384 pages. Signed by the author. Pictorial dust jacket over yellow cloth. Signed by the author with dedication to plate on front free endpaper. Pages are bright and clear with no visible markings. Binding remains firm throughout. Boards have minor corner bumping and edgewear; slight scuffing to rear board. Spine has soft crushing to ends. Unclipped dust jacket with minor rubbing to edges. Some minor scuffing overall.

Hardcover. Condition: Almost Fine. 1st Edition. EX UK.Poss' new & unopened Super copy with very minor shelflife part of the stock of a closing down Book Shop - D/j unclipped & fine - it looks like a possible ink signature signed Robin .! Guaranteed posting 24hrs from Cornwall St127. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Fair. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. 1st Edition. SIGNED BY ROBIN SHARMA on title page; Clean, tight; green highlighting throughout book; otherwise very minimal wear; Sharma shares a remarkable step-by-step system that will transform the way you lead your team and renew trust, commitment and hope within your organization. With masterful insight and brilliant simplicity, Sharma has distilled timeless wisdom for visionary leadership into a series of immensely practical lessons that leaders, managers and entrepreneurs can immediately apply to boost morale, liberate loyalty and send productivity soaring in these topsy-turvy times. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: As New. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. 1st Edition. First hardcover edition stated thus (preceded by a self published edition) first printing of an as new hardcover, with the publisher's promotional business card sized bookmark laid in, in an as new dustjacket. The author's fable about fulfilling your dreams and reaching your destiny. This copy is inscribed and signed by the author on the title page. Inscribed by Author.
